EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to the provider to inform that one corrective action has been reviewed by EEC and rejected, so it needs to be re-worked
EmailTemplate.name: 88a - Notification to Provider after Corrective Plan rejected (w/ Investigation)
EmailTemplate.subject: EEC - A correction plan you submitted on {!Inspection_Item__c.Date_Corrective_Actions_Received__c} requires your additional review
